description: This file contains unit tests for the NextJS project template, including fixtures for setting up mock directories and files, and tests for project initialization, configuration loading, parameter defaults, post-processing execution, and template variable replacement.

methods.name: temp_dir
methods.description: Creates a temporary directory for test outputs and cleans it up after tests.

methods.name: template_dir
methods.description: Sets up a mock template directory with configuration files and template files for testing.

methods.name: project_config
methods.description: Creates a sample project configuration object for testing.

methods.name: test_nextjs_init_info
methods.description: Tests retrieval of initialization info from the NextJS template.

methods.name: test_project_initialization
methods.description: Tests the project initialization process, including directory structure and content replacement.

methods.name: test_parameter_defaults
methods.description: Verifies that default parameters are applied when none are provided.

methods.name: test_post_processing_execution
methods.description: Checks that post-processing scripts are executed successfully.

methods.name: test_config_file_loading
methods.description: Tests loading project configuration from a JSON file.

methods.name: test_template_variable_replacement
methods.description: Ensures template variables in files are correctly replaced with project parameters.
